title: Goinstall fails on Windows
body:
by **estensJ9**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.Launch Dos-Prompt Window
2.cd %GOROOT%
3.Type "goinstall github.com/hoisie/web.go" and Enter.
4.Goinstall fails "goinstall: github.com/hoisie/web.go: mkdir c:\go/src/pkg: The
directory name invalid."

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

1.Path charactor "/" is changed to "\" in source main.go and make.go.
2.But I can't find how to make Packages "web.a" 
  and can't execute "exec make" in makefile.pkg on Windows.

What version of the product are you using? On what operating system?

WindowsXP SP3
Go 2010-07-14 Binary version

Please provide any additional information below.
